title: Case-Based Learning Course for Fostering Creative and Critical Thinking in Engineering Undergraduates

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering concepts and experience solving social issues
context.additional_context: Strengthening real-life problem-solving skills through engineering case analysis for general citizens.

learning_goals: Learners can write case study reports analyzing social issues from an engineering perspective with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present and logically justify creative alternatives at least three times in team-based case discussions.
Learners can create critical evaluation checklists for over five case studies provided through a mobile platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
